Title: Nimbusclient
Description:
Nimbus is a local cloud solution consisting of the Nimbus server and the Nimbus client software. 
Nimbus can be used in Dropbox style with a local folder.
HomeWiki:
Nimbusclient for Nimbus - serve files from local network (Lan) or from synced cloud storage

Nimbus is a local cloud solution consisting of two components: The Nimbus server and the Nimbus client software. Nimbus can be used in Dropbox style with a local folder. Its content is served as a webpage to the Local area network (LAN). In this use case internet access is not necessary. Alternatively, when Nimbus server is not started but internet access is available, you can also use a synced cloud storage from the internet to serve content to Nimbus clients.

Additionally when using Nimbus server there is a collective drawingboard and a collective poll app available for all clients in the LAN to collaborate.

Nimbus client can be used as webapp or as native app. A native app is availale for Android and Windows. The native Windows Nimbus client has a built in network discovery function to find the Nimbus server in the LAN.

For further Information about Nimbus see nimbus.codeplex.com. This page only describes the installation of the Nimbusclient software for windows.

Installation

After downloading Nimbusclient, copy the self extracting 7zip archive nimbusclient_setup.exe to the folder where you want Nimbusclient to be installed. In fact you can copy nimbusclient to any folder you like. A real installation is not necessary. For all functions of Nimbusclient to work correctly choose a folder where you have write privileges. For example you can choose D:\nimbusclient_setup.exe for Nimbusclient to be extracted to D:\nimbusclient. The folder contains the file Nimbusclient.exe to start the Nimbus client on the local machine and several other files and subfolders.

It is convenient to create a link of Nimbusclient.exe on your desktop or quick-start-bar by dragging the file to your desktop when holding the "ALT"-key.

If you prefer to extract the Nimbus files by yourself from nimbus_setup.exe you can download the 7zip software from www.7-zip.org.

To get the latest Nimbusclient updates, Nimbusclient has a built in update function. Nimbusclient checks immediately and at every program start for new updates and downloads them (nimbusclient.7z) to your Download folder. At the next program start you are asked to install the update.

Starting Nimbusclient

After starting Nimbusclient.exe the default Nimbusclient window opens:

Here you can see the address of the default Nimbus book from the internet and the corresponding QR-code. Beneath are the files served as pages from the selected Nimbus book as web pages.

With its built in discovery function Nimbusclient recognizes if a nimbus server is present in the LAN and automatically connects.

Further information on how to use Nimbus, Nimbusserver and Nimbusclient is available under nimbus.codeplex.com.
